title: Athletism — Skiing (Elite) — Phase 5: Strength → Power (RFD)
equipment: Gym: squat rack, platforms, barbells, dumbbells, cables
Stationary bike/Wattbike, treadmill (incline), curved sprint track
goal: Convert strength to usable slope power; rapid force and rate changes.

warmup: Activation 8–10' (glute med, deep core, scapular control)
Landing mechanics: snap-downs, pogos, lateral snap-downs
main: Contrast set: Back Squat 3x3 @RPE7 + hurdle hops 3x6
COD 3D: 5‑5‑5 pro‑agility, lateral shuffle + decel cues

notes: Week 1: Olympic derivatives light/moderate. Week 2: add accommodating resistance (bands)
